item.title: Babies who drank ByHeart formula got sick months before botulism outbreak, parents say
item.description: At least five families say their babies were treated for infant botulism after consuming ByHeart formula months before a current outbreak was detected

item.title: IPO market's red-hot year has been cooled by the shutdown and more caution among investors
item.description: A strong year for initial public offerings on Wall Street has fizzled out due to the government shutdown and a cautious turn by investors

item.title: Britain's Daily Mail publisher enters exclusive talks to buy Telegraph Media Group for $654 million
item.description: The publisher of Britain's Daily Mail has entered exclusive talks to buy Telegraph Media Group in a deal that would link two news groups that have tra...

item.title: How major US stock indexes fared Friday, 11/21/2025
item.description: More swings hit Wall Street, except it finished higher this time

item.title: Mercedes F1 team principal Toto Wolff sells 15% stake to CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz
item.description: Mercedes team principal Toto Wolff has sold 15% of his Formula 1 team share to George Kurtz, CEO of CrowdStrike
